strapiPost.title: Siloam Springs Kayak Park Opens For The Season
strapiPost.content:
Grab your paddle and boat because the Siloam Springs Kayak Park is open! 

  • On the water: The Siloam Springs Kayak Park opened in 2014 just south of the town and is located off Fisher Ford Rd on the spring-fed Illinois River. Kayaks, canoes, and tubes are all welcome to float, but you'd need to bring your own because you can't rent them at the park.
  • Go play: The park is free and open from 5:30a-11p, and the riverbank is ADA accessible. There are climbing boulders, a picnic area, accessible walking trails, and rapids engineered about 700 ft in Class I and II difficulty, so everyone can have some fun!

Learn more HERE.
